content:
StreamWriterDelegate StreamWriterDelegate Delegate

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceBus.Web
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll

This delegate is used by StreamMessageHelper to write the body of streamed messages.

Edit

In this Article

public delegate void StreamWriterDelegate(Stream output);Public Delegate Sub StreamWriterDelegate(output As Stream)
Parameters
output
Stream Stream

The stream to write the message body to.
